pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interactive Dendrograms // Interactive dendrogram that enables the user to select and color clusters, to zoom and pan the dendrogram, and to visualize the clustered data not only in a built-in heat map, but also in 'GGobi' interactive plots and user-supplied plots. This is a backport of Qt-based 'idendro' (https://github.com/tsieger/idendro) to base R graphics and Tcl/Tk GUI.
